Articles.Content:
Floor 2724: A living room with a fireplace... how does one make a fireplace in the tall building?

And how do they make new pages? They post, they entertain, then the tall building gifts them with a new page!
Floor 2725: FINALLY! AN ELEVATOR!!! But just before you climb in it randomly falls down. Welp...
Floor 2726: PERRY THE PLATYPUS!?!?!

Floors 2727 and 2728.

You can measure the gravity difference with a clock and a rope with a weight on it.
Floor 2729: ColdJ's creations, like a hall of fame!
Floor 2730: A giant rollercoaster. Hey, where's Perry?
2731: An identical rollercoaster, but this time it's a musical.
Floor 2732: All the tissues I used the day I was sneezing
Floor 2733: They seem to shoving an enormous pile of tissues in to a furnace to keep it running.

Floor 2734: This appears to be the roof, you are out in space, the stars wheel above your head, you are not sure why you can breath and haven't exploded. You can't seem to remember why you were climbing up in the first place. You sit in a convenient banana lounge chair with a drink in your hand and just drink in the majesty of the Solar system. You have done enough climbing, now you will just rest and slowly fade away, to be forgotten and buried in the long lost game threads that nobody plays anymore.
Floor 2735: Apparently, a floor with no floor. And no one in there.
Floor 2736: A black hole. I suggest you to run. FAST.

Floor 2737: What looks like a control room of some sort.  The main display is saying: Microsingularity contained. stolen Borrowed Romulan warp core no longer reaching critical. Power levels normal. You continue up, not feeling too safe just yet.
Floor 2738: A picture of the Mun with a sight of    the Moon.
Floor 2739: Mann Co. Stab training room.
Floor 2740: Sleeping beauty...?
2741: Pi room.
Floor 2742: “There won’t be a next floor if we don’t stop the banished”

Floor 2743: you see a blue kerbal and a bucket of paint washing the windows.

Edited March 14, 2022 by Zozaf Kerman
Floor 2744: A scratching post for cats! And lots of cats!
Floor 2745: A hundred vacuum cleaners suck all the cat hair off you.
Floor 2746: Puppies! Would you want to get one up?
Floor 2747: Having had a wonderful few hours playing with the puppies, you wonder how you are on a floor in space that is higher than the roof. Maybe you have gone mad and this is all a dream?
Floor 2748: All the Spiderman movies in a CD.
Floor 2749: Stark's private restroom.
